ygData.subject: Re: Illigeble Scoll and Rondo
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, this is a reply to a serious matter.. and if you don t like it then I d best suggest you leave the list.  And if you could see, alot of people have been
ygData.messageBody:
Well, this is a reply to a serious matter.. and if you don't like it then I'd
best suggest you leave the list. And if you could see, alot of people have
been helped by other people with their quest problems. I am sure someone will
help you out if you could only be patient enough for that person to reply.

Sincerely,

Trilin
Ranger on Mithaniel Marr
List Administrater

Deron Graham wrote:

> From: "Deron Graham" <Clutch@...>
>
> Do you perhaps some information about a quest? I thought this list was
> about questing, and not about some ramblings that have nothing to do with
> the topic.
